entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
